name: Form filling of HDFC bank KYC
short_description:
Offline domestic process for an Indian Bank.
 
#  Rate per form: Rs 28/-
#  Royalty per form: Rs 3/-
#  No of forms to be worked upon per month: 1 Lakh
#  Minimum no. of forms to be completed per month: 88,000/-
 
Accuracy and Rates are mentioned below:
 
         Accuracy	   Rate
  98.00 – 100 %	INR 28.00
  95.00 – 97.99%	INR 14.00
  90.00 – 94.99%	INR 7.00
  88.00 – 89.99 %	INR 3.00
  Less than < 88.00	One rework and Service Provider has to reach 95% minimum quality to be eligible for payment.
 
 
# Total payout per month:  Rs 28/- lakhs if 1 Lakhs forms are completed with 98% and above accuracy.
# Total Payout per annum: Rs 3.36/- Crores if 1 Lakhs forms are completed with 98% and above accuracy.
# Total Payout in 3 years:   Rs 10.08/- Crores if 1 Lakhs forms are completed with 98% and above accuracy.
 
# Procurement fees is Rs 8 Lakh (5 lakh is deposit which is refundable after 3 years and 3 lakh is non-refundable).
summary: HDFC/ICICI/SBI KYC Process ( loan consolidation)  form filling project
